eviware soapUI

Working Offline?

soapUI Pro can't access the Internet.

soapUI Pro is unable to access the Internet. This might cause some issues when doing Web Service Testing.

If you know that you need Internet Access in order to do Web Service Testing, please check you Internet Connection.

www.soapui.org

What's new in soapUI 3.6?

soapUI 3.6, the loadUI Release.

soapUI 3.6 is created to support loadUI, the new revolution in Load Testing. We'd like to encourage you to try it!

soapUI 3.6 also has support Browser Recording for Web Tests as well as support for Manual TestSteps outside of the software!



How do I start?

New soapUI User?

Start by doing the following:

  • Read the Feature Overview
  • Read the soapUI Pro comparison
  • Try your hands on the Example soapUI Project
  • Read the Getting Started with soapUI Guide
  • Watch the Example Project Movie
